thread.title: He's Alive: This Is What John Frusciante Looks Like In 2017 [News]
thread.title_full: He's Alive: This Is What John Frusciante Looks Like In 2017 [News]

title: He's Alive: This Is What John Frusciante Looks Like In 2017 [News]
text:
UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 16 hours ago 7 
A fresh photo of John Frusciante has recently surfaced, giving the fans a chance to see what the man looks like these days. 
Snapped in Venice, CA, the pic is available below via Instagram. 
When it comes to musical endeavors, John has released his latest full-length album under the alias of Trickfinger in 2015. Titled "Trickfinger," the record sees the musician diving into the world of acid house, electro and IDM music. A photo posted by Hans Medown (@jnp2) on Jan 21, 2017 at 7:34pm PST A photo posted by Eddy (@eddyrhcp) on Jan 22, 2017 at 11:08am PST
